# preferredDisplayDynamicRange

**Instance Property**

Describes how High Dynamic Range (HDR) video content renders.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var preferredDisplayDynamicRange: AVDisplayDynamicRange { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to `AVDisplayDynamicRangeAutomatic`.



## High dynamic range

- **AVDisplayDynamicRange**: Describes how High Dynamic Range (HDR) video content renders.
